name: INSearchCallHistoryIntent
desc: A request to list the calls matching the specified criteria.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: init(dateCreated: INDateComponentsRange?, recipient: INPerson?, callCapabilities: INCallCapabilityOptions, callTypes: INCallRecordTypeOptions, unseen: Bool?)
items.desc: Creates a search call history intent object with the specified search criteria.

items.name: init(call: INCallRecordType, dateCreated: INDateComponentsRange?, recipient: INPerson?, callCapabilities: INCallCapabilityOptions)
items.desc: Creates a search call history intent object with the specified search criteria.

items.name: var recipient: INPerson?
items.desc: The person involved in the call.

items.name: var dateCreated: INDateComponentsRange?
items.desc: The range of dates associated with the call records.

items.name: var callTypes: INCallRecordTypeOptions
items.desc: The types of calls to search.

items.name: var callCapabilities: INCallCapabilityOptions
items.desc: The audio-video capabilities of the call.

items.name: var unseen: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the user has seen the call yet.
